description.value:
Once per Combat, user may take 2 Full actions and make +10 Fellowship Test to grant any ally that can hear them +20 to Tests to resist effects of Fear and Pinning until the end of the encounter. If user is killed, stunned, or the sermon interrupted, gives -20 instead.

Requirements

A Tome that provides inspiration and guidance.

Effect: Average

Notes: -
